text: da#dhati praqjana#nAyaq jyOti#raqBitO# Bavati viqmOca#namEqva tacCandA(gg)#syEqva tad-viqmOka#M ~MyaqntyathO# uBaqyatO$jyOtiShaiqva Sha#DaqhEna# suvaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ~Mya#nti brahmavAqdinO# vadaqntyAsa#tEq kEna# yaqntIti# dEvaqyAnE#na paqthEti# brUyAqcCandA(gm)#siq vai dE#vaqyAnaqH panthA# gAyaqtrI triqShTub-jaga#tIqjyOtiqrvai gA#yaqtrI gaustriqShTugAyuqrjaga#tIq yadEqtE stOmAq Bava#nti dEvaqyAnE#naiqva - [  ] 5
